txt.en: 'I know not why these wolves have taken to preying on our men, but it must be stopped. Everyone must be kept safe, and more importantly, I cannot return to Stangard with more blood on my hands.\n\n'Their den is to the east along the shore of the Great River. May fortune be with you... I desire not to explain another loss.'
'Good, you made it back alive. Not that I doubted your resolve, but the Pit has claimed many a creature.\n\n'Now that the way is cleared, I have another task for you.'
Brifard is worried that the wolves have acquired a taste for Man-flesh.

Brifard has advised you to hunt down wolves in the nearby wolf-den to the north-east. This particular wolf-den has been nicknamed 'The Murderous Pit' by the Rohirrim of Stangard.\n\nBrifard wants you to cull the wolf-pack in response to their violence.
Brifard is located at the camp-site to the south-east of Thinglad.\n\nYou should return to Brifard with news of your success.
